org.commonreality.time.IAuthoritativeClock

    • Uses of IAuthoritativeClock in org.commonreality.time

      Methods in org.commonreality.time that return types with arguments of type IAuthoritativeClock 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Optional<IAuthoritativeClock> IClock.getAuthority()
      Most clock instances are strictly passive, however some clock instances need to be controlled, allowing the caller to set the time to specific values.
